meanings.definition: A type of paint or pigment that glows brightly in daylight or under ultraviolet light.
meanings.sent1: The artist used dayglo to create a striking mural on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The skateboard was painted with dayglo for a cool effect.
meanings.sent3: The kids had fun painting each other with dayglo at the art class.
meanings.sent4: The dayglo on the safety vests made the workers easily visible at night.
meanings.sent5: The dayglo on the road signs made driving safer in low light conditions.
